src:
Roly Serrano habló de su fallida experiencia al usar Tinder

03 Nov 2019, 13:49

Roly Serrano fue uno de los invitados del programa que conduce Andy Kusnetzoff, “Ph: podemos hablar”. Sorprendió al contar la mala experiencia que tuvo intentando conseguir citas en la app Tinder.
“Estaba con Diego Ramos y Nicolás Riera y me dijeron que estaban en Tinder” empezó relatando el actor de El Marginal. “Yo que estaba más solo que el cero les dije que me anoten. Pusieron una foto mía que estaba en Google. Comimos y en un momento ¡ting! una mujer. Yo había puesto promedio entre 38 y 50 años. La muchacha no era mi target. Se la veía un poco más grande” continuó contando entre risas.
“Apareció una que era una diosa, 40 años, muy linda mujer. Entonces le escribo, le digo que me encantaría conocerla. Yo estaba en Mar del Plata, estábamos a 50 cuadras” continuó.



“Siempre te amé, te admiré” relató Roly Serrano que le dijo la mujer. “Me preguntó si yo era Roly Serrano, le respondí que sí y me dijo ‘No sos vos’. Nos encontramos, nos conocemos, te paso a buscar. ‘Vos debés ser un onadita, un cagón, debés ser un horrible y ponés la cara de ese señor que es un caballero’ y no hablamos más” contó entre comentarios del resto de los invitados.




Fuente: Vía País.
text:
Roly Serrano talked about his failed experience using Tinder

03 Nov 2019, 13:49

Roly Serrano was one of the guests of the program conducted by Andy Kusnetzoff, "Ph: we can talk." He was surprised to tell the bad experience he had trying to get appointments in the Tinder app.
“I was with Diego Ramos and Nicolás Riera and they told me they were in Tinder,” began the actor from El Marginal. “I who was more alone than zero told them to write me down. They put a picture of me that was on Google. We ate and in a moment ting! a woman. I had averaged between 38 and 50 years. The girl was not my target. She looked a little bigger ”she continued counting with laughter.
“There appeared one who was a goddess, 40 years old, very pretty woman. Then I write to her, I tell her that I would love to meet her. I was in Mar del Plata, we were 50 blocks away, ”he continued.



"I always loved you, I admired you," Roly Serrano said the woman told him. "He asked me if I was Roly Serrano, I answered yes and he said 'It's not you.' We meet, we know each other, I'll pick you up. ‘You must be an onadite, a bullshit, you must be a horrible and you put the face of that gentleman who is a gentleman’ and we do not talk anymore, ”he said between comments from the rest of the guests.




Source: Via Country.
